snippet.textDisplay: Everytime I upload a track from this game, it brings me back to my first upload in 2007 and how I just wanted to listen to some VGM which were mostly nowhere to be found on YouTube. I certainly have no regrets going with this game as a way to start it all.
snippet.textOriginal: Everytime I upload a track from this game, it brings me back to my first upload in 2007 and how I just wanted to listen to some VGM which were mostly nowhere to be found on YouTube. I certainly have no regrets going with this game as a way to start it all.

snippet.textDisplay: great reply. This game's soundtrack is so powerful. For me it's up there with Chrono Trigger,FF4/6/7 and Suikoden 1 as the best of all time.
snippet.textOriginal: great reply. This game's soundtrack is so powerful. For me it's up there with Chrono Trigger,FF4/6/7 and Suikoden 1 as the best of all time.

snippet.textDisplay:
Time just keeps on going by, doesn't it? We have what we have for only a brief moment, and then the world moves on. Time belongs to someone else. 

But for now, today, here we are.
snippet.textOriginal:
Time just keeps on going by, doesn't it? We have what we have for only a brief moment, and then the world moves on. Time belongs to someone else. 

But for now, today, here we are.

snippet.textDisplay: Seeing the thumbnail also took me back to the beginnings of my only Youtuber whom I've never unsubscribed from. You hold a record of 12 years subscribal from me, isn't that amazing 😉😁
snippet.textOriginal: Seeing the thumbnail also took me back to the beginnings of my only Youtuber whom I've never unsubscribed from. You hold a record of 12 years subscribal from me, isn't that amazing 😉😁

snippet.textDisplay: I have listened to your whole list back to back so many times over the past...I dunno, 9 years-ish? It's become a mainstay of my life in a way. I guess what I want to say is: Thank you for doing what you do.
snippet.textOriginal: I have listened to your whole list back to back so many times over the past...I dunno, 9 years-ish? It's become a mainstay of my life in a way. I guess what I want to say is: Thank you for doing what you do.

snippet.textDisplay: I purchased this game because I listened to the theme on your first ever post. The soundtrack to this game stole my heart, and brought an awesome RPG to me. Thank you for that SupraDarky <3.
snippet.textOriginal: I purchased this game because I listened to the theme on your first ever post. The soundtrack to this game stole my heart, and brought an awesome RPG to me. Thank you for that SupraDarky <3.

snippet.textDisplay: Thanks so much for all your uploads so continuously all these years!! Always gives me a couple minutes every so often to relax and enjoy something new and maybe add some new games to my list. Cheers for everything so far and maybe another 13 years!!!
snippet.textOriginal: Thanks so much for all your uploads so continuously all these years!! Always gives me a couple minutes every so often to relax and enjoy something new and maybe add some new games to my list. Cheers for everything so far and maybe another 13 years!!!

snippet.textDisplay:
It's so weird, I feel like I've heard this before, but I never played a Wild Arms on PS1, tho. 

That's Rudy on the cover, right? There was one with him in it on the PS2, but I can't remember, because I lost it long ago.
snippet.textOriginal:

snippet.textDisplay: This series has always been my favorite. WA 1-3 are amazing games. I have beaten them so many times and now that Im married I figured it was time for my wife to try em. She is about half way through WA 1 and loving it.

snippet.textDisplay: 2007 wow i'm gettin' old 😅. I guess thank you for 13 years of great music. I never realised how thankful I actually am that this channel exists. You made me love video game music and I will always remember how I found your channel and listining to your VGMs all day long. Thanks a lot!
snippet.textOriginal: 2007 wow i'm gettin' old 😅. I guess thank you for 13 years of great music. I never realised how thankful I actually am that this channel exists. You made me love video game music and I will always remember how I found your channel and listining to your VGMs all day long. Thanks a lot!

snippet.textDisplay: It is bugging me you didn't post this theme before, it's one of the very first themes you hear in the game, it's like a classic. It's lovely playing this while starring out at the sunset, if only the mosquitoes went away.

snippet.textDisplay: You gotta love wild arms
snippet.textOriginal: You gotta love wild arms

snippet.textDisplay:
YEEESSSSS! FINALLY! After 3 months diligently going through your playlist while home office-ing, finally reached the "mid section" hahaha. Such a wonderful coincidence to reach it the same way it started: with Wild Arms 1. Honestly, I only played WA4 and WA5, but believe me: I WILL play the other games someday.
Anyway, you have one more fan joining your VGM journey :) I am really glad to have listened to it all. This 13 years old saga is incredible, I enjoyed it a lot through these months.
Thanks for putting a couple of videogame soundtracks up on Youtube hahaha
Greetings from Brazil!
snippet.textOriginal:
YEEESSSSS! FINALLY! After 3 months diligently going through your playlist while home office-ing, finally reached the "mid section" hahaha. Such a wonderful coincidence to reach it the same way it started: with Wild Arms 1. Honestly, I only played WA4 and WA5, but believe me: I WILL play the other games someday.
Anyway, you have one more fan joining your VGM journey :) I am really glad to have listened to it all. This 13 years old saga is incredible, I enjoyed it a lot through these months.
Thanks for putting a couple of videogame soundtracks up on Youtube hahaha
Greetings from Brazil!

snippet.textDisplay:
YAAASSSS more Wild Arms! I didn't know you could go to Lon Lon Ranch in this game...

Seriously, thanks for all the years of great VGM, SD. It if weren't for you, I might not have found my way back into the scene. Here's to another lucky 13!

snippet.textDisplay: When Nintendo had some great themes on their console, PlayStation had the JRPGs with their great soundtracks. I am still going back and finding new series that sound great but this one remains among my favourites.
snippet.textOriginal: When Nintendo had some great themes on their console, PlayStation had the JRPGs with their great soundtracks. I am still going back and finding new series that sound great but this one remains among my favourites.
